Animated comedy horror, with the voices of Mitchel Musso, Sam Lerner, Spencer Locke, Steve Buscemi, Maggie Gyllenhaal and Jason Lee.(n)

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures flee from an evil wizard, only to end up magically transported to modern-day New York. They search for a way to get back to their own village while evading their enemy, who has followed them to the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, with Neil Patrick Harris, Hank Azaria and Jayma Mays, plus voices of Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry.(n)

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.(n)

programme.desc: A friendly cheese race becomes a high-stakes dash to the finish after magpie Louis risks his friend's workshop with a secret bet. Animation, with the voices of John F Brungot, Anders Bye and Frimand Plosen.(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Long Haul
programme.desc: Youngster Greg Heffley hatches a plot to re-route a family road trip towards a videogame convention. Comedy sequel, starring Jason Drucker, Alicia Silverstone and Tom Everett Scott.(n)

programme.desc: A young family cursed by a witch and transformed into monsters. Animated comedy, with the voices of Emily Watson, Jason Isaacs and Nick Frost.(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Young courting couples Fred and Wilma, and Barney and Betty are invited to stay at a luxury casino in the Stone Age gambling capital. Owner Chip Rockefeller is bent on stopping Fred proposing to wealthy Wilma, because he wants to marry her himself for the money and settle his debts. Family comedy prequel, with Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Joan Collins, Alan Cumming, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski.(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller.

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate risk-management consultant decides whether or not to destroy an artificially created humanoid. Sci-fi thriller, starring Kate Mara, Anya Taylor-Joy and Rose Leslie.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Wetlands
programme.desc: A man attempts to make a new start in Atlantic City with the help of his daughter and a new business partner. Thriller, starring Heather Graham, Jennifer Ehle and Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje.

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: A smart-mouthed PR executive answers a public phone and the caller on the other end warns him that if he hangs up he will be shot. The unseen gunman then puts his target through a tortuous series of mind games, as well as incriminating him in the death of a bystander. Psychological thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Katie Holmes and Forest Whitaker.

programme.title: Kidulthood
programme.desc: West London teenagers face difficult choices that could affect the rest of their lives, as they struggle to deal with the effects of gun crime, drugs and bullying in their impoverished neighbourhood. Drama, written by and starring Noel Clarke, with Aml Ameen, Red Madrell, Jaime Winstone and Rafe Spall.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Misanthropic Korean War veteran Walt leads an isolated existence, and has a tense relationship with his family and nothing but contempt for his neighbours. When a teenager attempts to steal his prized car, he ends up trying to reform the thief, making a connection with the boy's relatives and defending them from a street gang. Drama, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood. With Christopher Carley and Bee Vang.

programme.title: Anon
programme.desc: In a world without anonymity or crime, a detective meets a woman who threatens their security. Sci-fi thriller from Gattaca and In Time director Andrew Niccol, starring Clive Owen, Amanda Seyfried and Colm Feore.

programme.title: Captain Phillips
programme.desc: An American cargo ship sets a dangerous course around the coast of Somalia, while inland, four men are pressed into service as pirates by the local warlords. The captain is taken hostage when the raiding party hijacks the vessel, resulting in a tense five-day crisis. Fact-based thriller, starring Tom Hanks and Barkhad Abdi.

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A woman sets out to make life a living hell for her ex-husband's new fiancee. Thriller, starring Rosario Dawson, Katherine Heigl and Geoff Stults.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: A philosophy-reading kung fu expert gains a reputation as the best bouncer around, and is hired by the owner of a rowdy Missouri bar to keep the peace. When he fires some of the establishment's corrupt staff, he incurs the wrath of a local crime boss who has a stranglehold on the town's businesses. Action thriller, starring Patrick Swayze, Ben Gazzara, Kelly Lynch, Sam Elliott and blues singer Jeff Healey.

programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook.

programme.title: Ninja Assassin
programme.desc: An orphan is raised by a secret society of assassins and trained to be the ultimate killing machine, but he rebels when they kill his childhood friend. When a detective on the trail of the order is marked for death, the fugitive comes to her aid and protects her from his rival ninjas. Action thriller, starring Rain and Naomie Harris.

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: The head of a search and rescue team whose children were kidnapped by her ex-husband hunts obsessively for a girl gone missing in the desert. However, her search is interrupted by news that her spouse has been found - but the children he took are nowhere to be found. Fact-based drama, starring Linda Hamilton and Kevin Kilner.

programme.title: The Shanghai Job
programme.desc: A washed-up private security agent has to escort a valuable Chinese antique out of Shanghai, but is ambushed during the journey. Action thriller, starring Orlando Bloom, Lei Wu and Simon Yam.

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson.

programme.title: Hijacked
programme.desc: FBI agent Gretchen Blair finds herself caught in the middle of an elaborate mid-air heist. Thriller, starring Denise Richards, Dolph Lundgren and Chuck Liddell.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In the 1980s, US pilot Barry Seal becomes a drug-runner for the CIA during a clandestine operation. Biopic, starring Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson and Sarah Wright.

programme.title: Goldstone
programme.desc: A hard-drinking Australian detective uncovers a web of corruption while on the trail of a missing tourist. Thriller, starring Aaron Pedersen, Alex Russell and Jacki Weaver.

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: A gay couple plan for a weekend of mischief, winding up the Christian owner of a remote Christian B&B. Events take a sinister turn when another guest arrives, who they think might have something more deadly in mind. Thriller, starring Tom Bateman, Sean Teale and Paul McGann.

programme.title: Flightplan
programme.desc: A widow boards a plane with her daughter and promptly falls asleep. When she wakes up, the girl has disappeared - and the mother's fear turns to outright panic when the aircraft crew insists she boarded the flight alone, suggesting the child is merely a figment of her distressed imagination. Thriller, starring Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean and Greta Scacchi.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Victorian stage illusionists Robert Angier and Alfred Borden engage in a bitter personal and professional rivalry. The pair resort to increasingly brutal measures to sabotage each other's acts, while Angier becomes obsessed with the secret behind Borden's greatest illusion. Christopher Nolan's mystery thriller, starring Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Piper Perabo and Scarlett Johansson, with David Bowie as real-life scientific pioneer Nikola Tesla.

programme.title: American Made
programme.desc: In the 1980s, US pilot Barry Seal becomes a drug-runner for the CIA during a clandestine operation. Biopic, starring Tom Cruise, Domhnall Gleeson and Sarah Wright.

programme.title: A Few Good Men
programme.desc: Two marines based in Cuba stand accused of murdering a comrade-in-arms. Three Navy lawyers working on their defence unearth evidence that the soldiers may have been acting under orders, which points to a trail of corruption leading all the way to a top-ranking officer. Drama based on Aaron Sorkin's stage play, starring Tom Cruise, Demi Moore, Kevin Pollack, Jack Nicholson, Kiefer Sutherland and Kevin Bacon.

programme.title: We Still Steal the Old Way
programme.desc: After their exploits in We Still Kill the Old Way, criminal outfit the Archer Gang encounters an old enemy when a daring heist ends with them behind bars. Prison drama, starring Ian Ogilvy, Billy Murray and Lysette Anthony.(n)

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: A male escort is falsely accused of murdering a wealthy woman, and his only hope of proving his innocence rests with a client reluctant to come forward and provide him with an alibi. Thriller, written and directed by Paul Schrader, starring Richard Gere, Lauren Hutton and Hector Elizondo.(n)

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos.(n)

programme.title: Escobar: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: A Canadian surfer on holiday in Colombia falls in love with a local girl, only to discover to his horror that her uncle is the notorious drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. He finds himself forced to become part of Escobar's family business, putting his life on the line as he faces the dangerous reality of the international cocaine trade. Thriller, starring Benicio Del Toro and Josh Hutcherson.(n)

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger.(n)

programme.title: Two Down
programme.desc: A web of deceit unfolds and an unlikely alliance is formed when a young woman and a local delivery boy are taken hostage by an injured hitman. Comedy thriller, starring Conleth Hill, Alex Hassell and Tori Butler Hart.(n)

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A thief takes a bank manager hostage while he and his gang make their getaway, only to later learn she lives in the same neighbourhood as him. As FBI agents close in, he tries to befriend her to make sure she cannot identify him, but as he falls in love with her, he considers changing his ways - risking the fury of his unstable partner in crime. Drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck. With Rebecca Hall and Jeremy Renner.(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Smuggler Danny Archer ends up in prison in war-torn Sierra Leone in 1999, where he meets Solomon, a Mende fisherman separated from his family by guerrillas. Danny pledges to help the desperate man rescue his son, who has been forcibly conscripted as a child soldier, in return for a rare pink diamond that Solomon had hidden away before his capture. Action thriller, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Djimon Hounsou and Jennifer Connelly.(n)

programme.title: The Hatton Garden Job
programme.desc: A ragtag group of career criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London. True-life crime drama, with Stephen Moyer, Larry Lamb and Matthew Goode.(n)

programme.title: The Town
programme.desc: A thief takes a bank manager hostage while he and his gang make their getaway, only to later learn she lives in the same neighbourhood as him. As FBI agents close in, he tries to befriend her to make sure she cannot identify him, but as he falls in love with her, he considers changing his ways - risking the fury of his unstable partner in crime. Drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck. With Rebecca Hall and Jeremy Renner.(n)

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent is accused of being a sleeper assassin with a deadly purpose - to kill the Russian president during a diplomatic visit and start a third world war. She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: Biopic of the infamous twin brothers who built up a criminal empire in the East End of London during the 1960s. Seizing territory from an already established rival by force, they quickly rose to prominence in the city's gangland culture. However, over time the brothers began to clash, while enemies stood ready to bring them down. Starring Gary and Martin Kemp, Billie Whitelaw and Tom Bell.(n)

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: A deep-space salvage crew investigate mysterious events aboard a hi-tech spaceship, which suddenly reappeared in orbit around Neptune after going missing for seven years - but it is not long before they are exposed to terror beyond their wildest nightmares. Sci-fi horror, starring Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan, Joely Richardson and Sean Pertwee.

A bureaucrat in a totalitarian society whose populace are kept under constant surveillance begins to question the regime he works for, and begins a secret, illegal relationship with a fellow subversive. However, their small rebellion is doomed to end in tragedy. Futuristic drama based on George Orwell's novel, starring John Hurt, Richard Burton and Suzanna Hamilton.

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: A thoroughly ordinary man is hurled into an intergalactic adventure when Earth is destroyed to make way for a hyperspace bypass. Luckily, his friend, who turns out to be an alien, gives him a handy travel guide to help him make sense of the universe. Sci-fi comedy based on Douglas Adams' classic series, with Martin Freeman, Bill Nighy, Mos Def, Zooey Deschanel and Sam Rockwell. Stephen Fry is the guide's narrator.

programme.title: The X Files: I Want to Believe
programme.desc: Paranormal investigators Mulder and Scully return to the FBI after years in hiding to assist in the search for several missing women. The investigation leads them to a former priest, who claims to have psychic visions of the victims, and a long-forgotten case involving sinister experiments. Second movie based on the sci-fi series, starring David Duchovny, Gillian Anderson and Billy Connolly.

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: With the Resistance cornered, aspiring warrior Rey tries to recruit Luke Skywalker in her battle against Kylo Ren and his evil forces. Fantasy adventure, starring Mark Hamill, Daisy Ridley, Adam Driver and Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
programme.desc: The team of intergalactic outlaws must fight to stay together as they unravel the mystery surrounding Peter Quill's father. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana and Kurt Russell, with the voices of Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A spaceship crash leaves a renowned war hero and his 13-year-old son stranded on Earth, which was abandoned by the human race centuries ago. Since mankind's departure, the planet has become home to all manner of dangerous life-forms, and the boy must make a desperate journey across hostile terrain to secure a rescue for his injured father. Sci-fi adventure, starring Will and Jaden Smith, with Sophie Okonedo.

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn.

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: With the Resistance cornered, aspiring warrior Rey tries to recruit Luke Skywalker in her battle against Kylo Ren and his evil forces. Fantasy adventure, starring Mark Hamill, Daisy Ridley, Adam Driver and Oscar Isaac.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2
programme.desc: The team of intergalactic outlaws must fight to stay together as they unravel the mystery surrounding Peter Quill's father. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana and Kurt Russell, with the voices of Bradley Cooper and Vin Diesel.

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.

programme.title: Antibirth
programme.desc: A wild night out becomes a seriously bad trip when hard-partying Lou starts feeling the symptoms of pregnancy. Horror, starring Natasha Lyonne, Chloe Sevigny and Meg Tilly.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santa's selfish brother Fred has been ostracised by his family for years, but when his crooked ways land him in jail, his brother comes along to bail him out on one condition - he must return to the family business and make toys for Christmas. But instead of cleaning up his act, Fred pushes Santa's patience to the limit with his far from festive attitude. Comedy, starring Vince Vaughn, Paul Giamatti, Rachel Weisz, Miranda Richardson and Kevin Spacey.

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: A reclusive genius creates a boy but dies before completing him, leaving his brainchild with scissor-like blades in place of hands. A kindly woman from a nearby suburb takes pity on the lonely figure and welcomes him into her home. He quickly becomes a hit in the neighbourhood - but then his new friends start to turn against him. Tim Burton's fantasy, starring Johnny Depp, Winona Ryder, Dianne Wiest and Vincent Price.

programme.title: The Nut Job 2: Nutty By Nature
programme.desc: Surly the squirrel must save the day when a property-developing mayor threatens his city park home. Animated sequel, with the voices of Will Arnett and Jackie Chan.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Bruce Wayne enlists the help of Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash in the fight against super villain Steppenwolf. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot and Henry Cavill.

programme.title: Call Me by Your Name
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Elio begins a relationship with Oliver, his father's research assistant in northern Italy. Oscar and Bafta-winning romantic drama, starring Armie Hammer, Timothee Chalamet and Michael Stuhlbarg.

programme.title: The Nut Job 2: Nutty By Nature
programme.desc: Surly the squirrel must save the day when a property-developing mayor threatens his city park home. Animated sequel, with the voices of Will Arnett and Jackie Chan.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Bruce Wayne enlists the help of Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash in the fight against super villain Steppenwolf. Sci-fi adventure, starring Ben Affleck, Gal Gadot and Henry Cavill.

programme.title: Happy Death Day
programme.desc: A college student must relive the day of her murder over and over until she discovers her killer's identity. Horror, starring Jessica Rothe, Israel Broussard and Ruby Modine.

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: After a message from God, unemployed handyman Gary Faulkner travels to Pakistan on a mission to kill Osama bin Laden. Comedy, starring Nicolas Cage, Russell Brand and Wendi McLendon-Covey.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to the magical world accompanied by their selfish cousin. They join their old friend King Caspian as he sets sail across the sea in search of seven of his father's allies who had been banished years before, but along the way they discover an evil force is growing in strength. Fantasy adventure, with Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, Will Poulter and Ben Barnes.

programme.title: Final Score: Behind The Scenes
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest Sky Cinema Original Film, an explosive action thriller featuring Guardians of the Galaxy and Avengers star Dave Bautista.

programme.title: Jack and Jill
programme.desc: A successful advertising executive dreads the annual visit from his annoying twin sister, who this time refuses to leave. He fears she will ruin his chances of persuading Al Pacino to appear in a commercial, only for the Hollywood star to become smitten with the unwanted guest. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler in a dual role, with Katie Holmes and Pacino as himself.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: Five medical students embark on a daring experiment. By stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near-death experience, giving them a first hand account of the afterlife. Sci-fi drama based on the 1990 thriller, starring Ellen Page, Diego Luna and Nina Dobrev.

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: The warrior is imprisoned on the other side of the universe and attempts to get back to Asgard to stop the destruction of his homeworld by his evil sister. However, while fighting as a gladiator for a crazed dictator, Thor finds help from an unexpected source. Fantasy adventure, starring Chris Hemsworth, Cate Blanchett, Tom Hiddleston and Mark Ruffalo.

programme.title: Final Score: Behind The Scenes
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest Sky Cinema Original Film, an explosive action thriller featuring Guardians of the Galaxy and Avengers star Dave Bautista.

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: A London neurosurgeon desperate to attend an operation crosses paths with an American bride determined to get to her wedding. When their chartered flight crashes, they attempt to survive in the wilderness, while fighting their attraction to each other. Romantic adventure, starring Idris Elba, Kate Winslet and Beau Bridges.

programme.title: A United Kingdom
programme.desc: Trouble brews when King Seretse Khama of Botswana falls for Ruth Williams, a London office worker. Fact-based drama from Belle director Amma Assante, starring David Oyelowo and Rosamund Pike.

programme.title: Jack and Jill
programme.desc: A successful advertising executive dreads the annual visit from his annoying twin sister, who this time refuses to leave. He fears she will ruin his chances of persuading Al Pacino to appear in a commercial, only for the Hollywood star to become smitten with the unwanted guest. Comedy, starring Adam Sandler in a dual role, with Katie Holmes and Pacino as himself.

programme.desc: A London neurosurgeon desperate to attend an operation crosses paths with an American bride determined to get to her wedding. When their chartered flight crashes, they attempt to survive in the wilderness, while fighting their attraction to each other. Romantic adventure, starring Idris Elba, Kate Winslet and Beau Bridges.

programme.title: The Beguiled
programme.desc: The arrival of a wounded Civil War soldier brings jealousy and betrayal to a Southern girls' school. Period drama, starring Colin Farrell, Nicole Kidman and Kirsten Dunst.(n)

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: A misfit teen from a tough California neighbourhood embarks on a perilous journey to retrieve a pair of stolen sneakers. Coming-of-age drama, starring Jahking Guillory, Christopher Jordan Wallace and Mahershala Ali.(n)

programme.title: Percy Jackson & the Lightning Thief
programme.desc: A teenager is shocked to discover he is the son of Greek god Poseidon and has been accused of stealing Zeus's lightning bolt. The youngster is given 14 days to find the culprit and return the missing item before the furious deity instigates an apocalyptic war. Fantasy adventure, starring Logan Lerman, Pierce Brosnan, Brandon T Jackson, Alexandra Daddario, Jake Abel, Sean Bean and Steve Coogan.(n)

programme.title: Honey 3: Dare to Dance
programme.desc: A hip-hop inspired performance of Romeo and Juliet in Cape Town is threatened by tensions among the cast. Dance drama sequel, starring Cassie Ventura, Kenny Wormald and Dena Kaplan.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell.(n)

programme.title: The Wilde Wedding
programme.desc: A movie star is preparing to get married for the fourth time, a situation that does not please her children, nor her favourite of her three ex-husbands. Tensions soon erupt as her extended family gathers for the big day. Comedy, starring Glenn Close, John Malkovich, Patrick Stewart and Minnie Driver.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen.(n)

programme.title: The Book of Henry
programme.desc: A single mum sets out to rescue an abused girl using instructions from her genius son's notebook. Drama, starring Naomi Watts and Jacob Tremblay. Directed by Jurassic World's Colin Trevorrow.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor.(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow.(n)

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After an African American photographer and his white girlfriend visit her wealthy parents, he suspects there's more to the locals than meets the eye. Psychological thriller, starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones.(n)

programme.title: Black Mountain Poets
programme.desc: Lisa and Claire Walker go on the run after bodging the attempted theft of a JCB from an industrial estate and end up stealing a car belonging to Alys and Terri Wilding, performance poets who were on their way to a competition and retreat in the Brecon Beacons. Lisa and Claire adopt the sisters' identities and decide to lie low at the event until the heat has died down. Comedy drama, starring Alice Lowe and Dolly Wells.

programme.title: Earthquake
programme.desc: In the aftermath of a catastrophic earthquake in Los Angeles, an architect helping in the rescue effort searches the smouldering ruins for his missing wife. Meanwhile, other residents, including an insubordinate cop, a lecherous shopkeeper and a daredevil motorcyclist, face their own battles for survival. Disaster movie, starring Charlton Heston, Ava Gardner, Genevieve Bujold, Richard Roundtree and George Kennedy.

programme.title: Twelve O'Clock High
programme.desc: A US Air Force officer takes command of a bomber squadron based in England, and has to suppress his humane instincts to restore morale and discipline - a task which places a heavy strain on his mental state and brings his weary men to the edge of endurance. Oscar-winning Second World War drama, with Gregory Peck, Hugh Marlowe, Gary Merrill and Dean Jagger.

programme.title: Track of the Cat
programme.desc: A troubled family starts to fall apart during a harsh winter in 19th-century northern California while staving off the menacing presence of a predator - until a tragic accident finally brings matters to a head. Western melodrama, starring Robert Mitchum, Teresa Wright and Diana Lynn.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: A woman sets in motion a multimillion-dollar lawsuit against the manufacturer of the gun that was used to kill her husband - but her actions spark an unexpected series of events when a jury consultant for the defence tries to buy the verdict his clients want. Thriller, adapted from a novel by John Grisham, starring John Cusack, Gene Hackman, Dustin Hoffman, Rachel Weisz and Bruce Davison.

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: An elite military team takes on a top-secret mission in the jungles of Central America, but the soldiers realise they have been deceived by their CIA employers. A greater danger presents itself when they are stalked by a lethal alien big-game hunter with the power to become invisible, that has come to Earth to stalk human prey. Sci-fi thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Carl Weathers and Bill Duke.

programme.title: Predator 2
programme.desc: A Los Angeles cop, working to bring down the city's drug gangs, suspects Jamaican criminals when he discovers several of his targets killed and skinned alive. However, the culprit behind the murders reveals himself to be an alien big-game hunter - with the stealth and guile to outwit the police and criminals alike. Sci-fi sequel, starring Danny Glover, Bill Paxton, Gary Busey and Maria Conchita Alonso.

programme.title: The East
programme.desc: A former FBI agent working for a private security firm is sent to infiltrate an anarchist movement behind a series of actions against corrupt corporations. She joins them in their acts of sabotage, but finds her loyalties changing as she forms connections with members of the group. Thriller, starring Brit Marling, Ellen Page and Alexander Skarsgard.

programme.title: The Inn of the Sixth Happiness
programme.desc: English servant Gladys Aylward fulfills her dream of becoming a missionary in China. Working from a roadside inn used by mule caravans, she ends up caring for dozens of orphans, who she courageously leads to safety through hostile and mountainous territory during the Sino-Japanese War. Fact-based drama, starring Ingrid Bergman, with Curt Jurgens, Ronald Squire and Robert Donat.

programme.title: The Four Musketeers
programme.desc: The swashbuckling heroes, with young swordsman D'Artagnan promoted to their ranks, are sent to quell an uprising against the king. But the scheming Cardinal Richelieu continues plotting to seize power, while his treacherous partner-in-crime Milady de Winter has revenge in mind. Adventure sequel, starring Oliver Reed, Michael York, Charlton Heston, Faye Dunaway, Christopher Lee, Richard Chamberlain and Frank Finlay.

programme.title: Von Ryan's Express
programme.desc: A courageous American colonel with a never-say-die attitude is held in a PoW camp. He boldly sets out to lead a group of Allied prisoners in a daring mass escape bid by hijacking a freight train and fleeing through occupied Italy to Switzerland. Second World War action adventure, starring Frank Sinatra, Trevor Howard, Brad Dexter and James Brolin.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: An alien criminal escapes from a prison on the moon and goes back in time on a mission of revenge, changing the course of history. Agent J of the top-secret Earth defence organisation follows him back to 1969, and joins forces with a younger version of his mentor Agent K to set things right. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Will Smith, Josh Brolin and Tommy Lee Jones.

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: Two expeditions set out to climb to the summit of the world's highest mountain. Both parties of mountaineers get caught in one of the fiercest snowstorms ever recorded, and face a desperate struggle to survive against the elements. Fact-based adventure, starring Jason Clarke, Josh Brolin, Jake Gyllenhaal and Keira Knightley.

programme.title: Lockout
programme.desc: A government agent is framed for murder, and sentenced to a prison on board a space station. Before he can be sent there, a riot takes place in the penitentiary and the convicts seize control, holding the president's daughter hostage. The condemned man is offered a pardon if he can rescue her. Sci-fi thriller, starring Guy Pearce and Maggie Grace.

programme.title: Northern Soul
programme.desc: A teenager living in a Northern town in the 1970s finds his horizons expanded when he discovers American soul music. He develops an inseparable friendship with a fellow devotee and the pair hope to achieve a brighter future beyond their bleak daily life. Drama, starring Elliot James Langridge, Josh Whitehouse, Steve Coogan and Ricky Tomlinson.(n)

programme.title: Buchanan Rides Alone
programme.desc: A drifter rides into a town dominated by the members of a ruthless family. He befriends a Mexican in jail for killing a man who attacked his sister and tries to save him from the gallows, getting caught up in the evil clan's running internal conflicts in the process. Western, starring Randolph Scott, Craig Stevens, Manuel Rojas and Barry Kelley.(n)

programme.title: Footsteps in the Fog
programme.desc: A prominent Victorian gentleman thinks he has got away with poisoning his wife, but his shrewd maid knows the sordid truth and uses it to blackmail him. As the killer's social standing improves, he realises he has to get rid of the scheming servant once and for all, but his plans to dispose of her lead him into even more danger. Period thriller, with Stewart Granger, Jean Simmons and Bill Travers.(n)

programme.title: Rear Window
programme.desc: A photographer is left housebound and in a wheelchair after breaking his leg in an accident. He passes the time watching the comings and goings of his neighbours in the apartment block opposite and becomes convinced one of them has committed a murder. However, he has trouble persuading anyone to believe his story. Hitchcock thriller, starring James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Raymond Burr, Thelma Ritter and Judith Evelyn.(n)

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: An American oil company representative is sent to buy a Scottish coastal village so it can be demolished to make way for a new refinery. He gradually takes a shine to the place, while the locals are more interested in the money they can get for parting with it. Bill Forsyth's comedy drama, starring Peter Riegert, Burt Lancaster, Denis Lawson, Peter Capaldi, Jenny Seagrove and Fulton Mackay.(n)

programme.title: The Cold Light of Day
programme.desc: A man on a sailing holiday in Spain discovers his family have been abducted. His search for them leads him to learn that his father has been leading a double-life as a CIA agent, and has stolen top-secret information - which the kidnappers will stop at nothing to obtain. Thriller, starring Henry Cavill, Bruce Willis and Sigourney Weaver.(n)

programme.title: Broken City
programme.desc: A New York cop is forced to quit the force to avoid a scandal over the shooting of a suspect, and becomes a private eye. Years later, the mayor hires the detective during a re-election campaign to find out if his wife is having an affair - but the investigation uncovers a web of political corruption. Crime thriller, with Mark Wahlberg, Russell Crowe and Catherine Zeta-Jones.(n)

programme.title: Dredd
programme.desc: An uncompromising law enforcer in a post-apocalyptic city is assigned to train a psychic new recruit. A report of three murders leads them to a tower block dominated by a ruthless drug lord, only for the gangster to seal off the building, forcing them to fight their way out. Sci-fi thriller based on the 2000AD comic-strip, starring Karl Urban, Lena Headey and Olivia Thirlby.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin and Mary Ellen enter a traditionally all-male race to raise money for the war effort, with Elizabeth coaching them. Jeffrey dreams of meeting a movie star.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jeffrey befriends a German prisoner of war who has escaped from a camp in North Carolina and hidden in the mountains, and the family asks him to join them for Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mrs Whipple's son returns home after fighting in the Civil War, but the trauma of the conflict has left him with an addiction to morphine.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by the destruction left in the wake of a tornado, a weary Charles Ingalls convinces himself to give up making a life for his family on an unforgiving prairie.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd becomes involved in an intense debate when she offers to help a deaf girl, and Jim falls for a free-spirited flirt. Drama, starring Melina Kanakarades.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd and Owen's romance hots up, while Joanie and Jackson explore the joys of college life together. Elsewhere, Jim is forced to make a choice after he goes on a date in Meredith's absence. Drama, starring Melina Kanakarades and Mike Farrell.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Zoya
programme.desc: Part one of two. A Russian aristocrat is forced by the Revolution into a life of poverty-stricken exile in Paris, where she falls for a handsome American soldier. The couple move to New York and seem set for a life of happiness - until the Wall Street Crash deals another devastating blow. Melodrama, based on Danielle Steel's novel, starring Melissa Gilbert, Bruce Boxleitner and Diana Rigg.

programme.title: Earl Hamner Storyteller
programme.desc: Documentary shedding light on the life and legacy of Earl Hamner, creator of The Waltons and writer for The Twilight Zone.

programme.title: The Thorn Birds: The Missing Years
programme.desc: Part one of a sequel to the blockbuster TV drama, exploring the period of history skipped over in the original series, following the cross-continental escapades of a wartime priest (Richard Chamberlain), his illicit lover (Amanda Donohoe), and her brutish husband. While raising her family in the Australian Outback, the wayward wife dabbles in deceit to keep the truth about the priest's illegitimate child from her husband. Also starring Simon Westaway, Julia Blake and Olivia Burnette.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia seeks help from the Pickett defence plant for a day nursery for the children of the defence workers, but encounters much difficulty. When Corabeth discovers a perfumed handkerchief in her husband's pocket, she suspects the worst of Ike ruining their anniversary celebrations.

programme.title: Ironside
programme.desc: Fran and Ed witness a suspicious death during an investigation into music piracy. Police drama, starring Raymond Burr.

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the All-Star Assassin
programme.desc: The ace attorney leaps into action to help an old friend prove an injured professional hockey player did not murder his team's power-hungry owner. As the duo investigate, they discover the dead man had no shortage of enemies who might have pulled the trigger. Courtroom drama, starring Raymond Burr, Alexandra Paul, Barbara Hale and Jason Beghe.

programme.title: Perry Mason Returns
programme.desc: Perry gives up his position as a judge to help old friend Della Street beat a murder charge, employing the son of a former colleague to assist him in his mission. Murder mystery, starring Raymond Burr, Barbara Hale, William Katt, and Patrick O'Neal.

programme.title: Ike: The War Years
programme.desc: Part two of three. Biopic of Dwight D Eisenhower following his path up the army ranks to commander of Allied forces in the Second World War and US president. Starring Robert Duvall.

programme.title: Les Miserables
programme.desc: A reformed criminal tries to lead a respectable life devoted to the care of his daughter, but it is only a matter of time before his lawless past catches up with him. Period drama, starring Liam Neeson, Geoffrey Rush, Uma Thurman and Claire Danes.

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.

programme.title: Les Miserables
programme.desc: A reformed criminal tries to lead a respectable life devoted to the care of his daughter, but it is only a matter of time before his lawless past catches up with him. Period drama, starring Liam Neeson, Geoffrey Rush, Uma Thurman and Claire Danes.

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A taxi driver is found murdered in his cab outside a jeweller's, leading Burke and Fraser to investigate the shop's owner and his family, who deny all knowledge of the deceased. Meanwhile, Ross and Reid discover a link between the dead man and a powerful underworld figure, and suspicion begins to fall on a shady lawyer with political ambitions. Blythe Duff and John Michie star.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Cindy is introduced to a self-help book on how to be the perfect wife, but when she follows the instructions found within she risks going into premature labour due to exhaustion.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A soldier in Jason's company explains what is happening to the Jews at the hands of the Nazis in Europe. Meanwhile, Elizabeth gets teased for being such a smart student at school.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Caleb Hodgekiss comes up with a way to scam the residents of Walnut Grove after rescuing a seriously ill Rev Alden from his runaway wagon. Johnny Cash guest stars.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Nellie Oleson is seriously injured after falling from a horse that used to belong to Laura Ingalls, and her mother blames the steed's former owner for the accident.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: A schizophrenic patient becomes obsessed with Syd, prompting her to seek refuge at Owen's house. Drama, starring Melina Kanakarades and Mike Farrell.

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: With her stalker closing in on her, Syd finds herself trapped in the hospital as a fire breaks out. Drama, starring Melina Kanakaredes and Mike Farrell.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Zoya
programme.desc: The Wall Street Crash deals another devastating blow to exiled Russian aristocrat Zoya as she moves to New York with the handsome American soldier she met in Paris. Concluding part of the melodrama based on Danielle Steel's novel, starring Melissa Gilbert, Bruce Boxleitner and Diana Rigg.

programme.title: Love Finds a Home
programme.desc: A female doctor in a small 19th-century town looks after a friend in the last stages of pregnancy, but finds herself continually at odds with her patient's mother-in-law, who believes in homeopathic treatments. The doctor also has to contend with her daughter's first love and her own inability to conceive. Period drama sequel, based on Janette Oke's novel, starring Sarah Jones and Haylie Duff.

programme.title: The Thorn Birds: The Missing Years
programme.desc: Part two of a sequel to the blockbuster TV drama, exploring the period of history skipped over in the original series, following the cross-continental escapades of a wartime priest (Richard Chamberlain), his illicit lover (Amanda Donohoe), and her brutish husband. While raising her family in the Australian Outback, the wayward wife dabbles in deceit to keep the truth about the priest's illegitimate child from her husband. Also starring Simon Westaway, Julia Blake and Olivia Burnette.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A film crew shoot a documentary at the plant, and the director tells Erin he can make her a star.

programme.title: Ironside
programme.desc: The veteran cop investigates when the son of an old friend is accused of murdering a Chinatown businessman. Raymond Burr stars.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Sparkling Cyanide
programme.desc: Modern reworking of Agatha Christie's classic murder mystery, starring Pauline Collins, Oliver Ford Davies, Kenneth Cranham and Susan Hampshire. A football chairman hosts a glitzy party to celebrate a new signing, but as the guests raise their glasses to toast a successful future, his wife suddenly drops dead. A pair of MI5 agents are called in to investigate, and it's not long before the finger of suspicion points at the victim's husband - until he too is murdered.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's A Caribbean Mystery
programme.desc: Miss Marple arrives in the Bahamas for rest and recuperation, where she encounters a retired army officer with a secret to reveal. He claims to have proof that a guest at the resort is a killer, but before he can specify who, he is poisoned and the incriminating evidence disappears. It falls to the indomitable amateur sleuth to unmask the culprit. Drama, with Helen Hayes, Barnard Hughes, Season Hubley and Swoosie Kurtz.

programme.title: Ike: The War Years
programme.desc: Part three of three. Biopic of Dwight D Eisenhower following his path up the army ranks to commander of Allied forces in the Second World War and US president. With Robert Duvall.

programme.title: To Sir, with Love
programme.desc: A black engineer takes a teaching job at a tough London school to make ends meet, and over the course of his difficult first term, struggles to gain the respect of his disruptive pupils. Drama, starring Sidney Poitier, Christian Roberts, Judy Geeson, Geoffrey Bayldon, Patricia Routledge, Christopher Chittell and Lulu.

programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.

programme.title: To Sir, with Love

Drama, starring Sidney Poitier, Christian Roberts, Judy Geeson, Geoffrey Bayldon, Patricia Routledge, Christopher Chittell and Lulu.

programme.title: Hatton Garden: The Heist
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama following the events leading up to a gang of veteran criminals pulling off an audacious robbery at safe deposit facility in London, stealing around £200 million in the process. Starring Michael McKell and Sydney Livingstone.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Elizabeth falls for a new teacher, but is devastated to find he does not have long to live. Meanwhile, Ben worries about his new responsibilities as Cindy gives birth to a girl.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Josh gets caught breaking into Ike's store with Jeffrey, who manages to get away without being seen. Meanwhile, Ben decides to enlist after being humiliated by a soldier.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and her horse Bunny are favoured to win the upcoming race in Walnut Grove. However, Mrs Oleson believes the victory should go to Nellie. To guarantee her success she purchases a thoroughbred and provides the trophy.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: While collecting insects for a school project, Laura and Mary become annoyed at Carrie as she lets the bugs escape, but worry when the youngster wanders off and goes missing.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd faces the challenge of raising money to re-build the hospital, as well as working with a new boss. Drama, starring Melina Kanakaredes and Mike Farrell.(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd begins to have second thoughts about marrying Owen. Drama, starring Melina Kanakarades and Mike Farrell.(n)

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Now and Forever
programme.desc: A couple's seemingly perfect marriage is destroyed when the husband is accused of rape by another woman. Drama based on the novel by Danielle Steele, starring Cheryl Ladd and Robert Coleby, with Christine Amor.(n)

programme.title: Love Takes Wing
programme.desc: A doctor takes up a new position in a small frontier town, where a mysterious illness is afflicting the residents. The medic takes desperate measures to stop the infection spreading, but also has to convince suspicious townsfolk that a local orphanage is not the source of the disease. Drama, starring Sarah Jones, Haylie Duff, Patrick Duffy and Cloris Leachman.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: Part one of two. Adaptation of the fairy tale set in post-war Rome, following the story of a young woman with a gift for music who is forced to work as a maid in her stepmother's hotel. With Rosabell Laurenti Sellers and Frank Crudele.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia make a decision about publishing a manuscript John-Boy wrote while overseas. Meanwhile, Jeffrey becomes very attached to an old dog.(n)

programme.title: Ironside
programme.desc: The wheelchair-using cop attends his high-school reunion, where he is confronted with the murder of a former class mate. Police drama, starring Raymond Burr.(n)

programme.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson set out to protect the last remaining member of the aristocratic Baskerville family, who believes he is being persecuted by a monstrous spectral hound roaming the bleak Devon moors. Adaptation of Arthur Conan Doyle's mystery thriller, starring Ian Richardson, Donald Churchill, Denholm Elliott, Martin Shaw and Brian Blessed.(n)

programme.title: In the Line of Duty: Hunt for Justice
programme.desc: The many branches of American law enforcement come together in an effort to stop three revolutionary terrorists from continuing on their path of deadly destruction across the country. Thriller, starring Adam Arkin, Nicholas Turturro and Dan Lauria.(n)

programme.title: Ike: Countdown to D-Day
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about the appointment of American general Dwight D Eisenhower to the post of Supreme Allied Commander in Europe, charting the months of preparation leading up to the Normandy landings, and the conflicts that developed between British, French and American leaders. Starring Tom Selleck, James Remar, Timothy Bottoms, Bruce Phillips and Ian Mune.(n)

programme.title: To Sir, with Love 2
programme.desc: After 30 years teaching in London, Mark Thackeray retires and returns to his home town of Chicago. However, the sight of a deprived school inspires him to return to duty and make a difference in the lives of more struggling students. Drama sequel, starring Sidney Poitier and Daniel J Travanti.(n)

programme.title: Hunt for the I-5 Killer
programme.desc: Dramatisation of the year-long manhunt for American serial murderer Randall Brent Woodfield, who targeted women along the I-5 motorway in 1981. Thriller, starring John Corbett, Sara Canning and Tygh Runyan.(n)

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A medical researcher accuses a rival doctor of attacking him with a syringe full of lethal drugs, but when he is later found murdered, the bitter feud between the two medics turns out to be just the tip of the iceberg for DCI Burke and the team. Both men have many enemies, especially after their drug trials resulted in a woman's death, and affairs of the heart muddy the water for the detectives in their search for the real killer. Drama, starring Blythe Duff and Alex Norton.

programme.title: Danielle Steel's Now and Forever
programme.desc: A couple's seemingly perfect marriage is destroyed when the husband is accused of rape by another woman. Drama based on the novel by Danielle Steele, starring Cheryl Ladd and Robert Coleby, with Christine Amor.(n)

programme.title: Love Takes Wing
programme.desc: A doctor takes up a new position in a small frontier town, where a mysterious illness is afflicting the residents. The medic takes desperate measures to stop the infection spreading, but also has to convince suspicious townsfolk that a local orphanage is not the source of the disease. Drama, starring Sarah Jones, Haylie Duff, Patrick Duffy and Cloris Leachman.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: Part one of two. Adaptation of the fairy tale set in post-war Rome, following the story of a young woman with a gift for music who is forced to work as a maid in her stepmother's hotel. With Rosabell Laurenti Sellers and Frank Crudele.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John and Olivia make a decision about publishing a manuscript John-Boy wrote while overseas. Meanwhile, Jeffrey becomes very attached to an old dog.(n)

programme.title: Ironside
programme.desc: The wheelchair-using cop attends his high-school reunion, where he is confronted with the murder of a former class mate. Police drama, starring Raymond Burr.(n)

programme.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson set out to protect the last remaining member of the aristocratic Baskerville family, who believes he is being persecuted by a monstrous spectral hound roaming the bleak Devon moors. Adaptation of Arthur Conan Doyle's mystery thriller, starring Ian Richardson, Donald Churchill, Denholm Elliott, Martin Shaw and Brian Blessed.(n)

programme.title: In the Line of Duty: Hunt for Justice
programme.desc: The many branches of American law enforcement come together in an effort to stop three revolutionary terrorists from continuing on their path of deadly destruction across the country. Thriller, starring Adam Arkin, Nicholas Turturro and Dan Lauria.(n)

programme.title: Ike: Countdown to D-Day
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about the appointment of American general Dwight D Eisenhower to the post of Supreme Allied Commander in Europe, charting the months of preparation leading up to the Normandy landings, and the conflicts that developed between British, French and American leaders. Starring Tom Selleck, James Remar, Timothy Bottoms, Bruce Phillips and Ian Mune.(n)

programme.title: To Sir, with Love 2
programme.desc: After 30 years teaching in London, Mark Thackeray retires and returns to his home town of Chicago. However, the sight of a deprived school inspires him to return to duty and make a difference in the lives of more struggling students. Drama sequel, starring Sidney Poitier and Daniel J Travanti.(n)

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.(n)

programme.title: To Sir, with Love 2
programme.desc: After 30 years teaching in London, Mark Thackeray retires and returns to his home town of Chicago. However, the sight of a deprived school inspires him to return to duty and make a difference in the lives of more struggling students. Drama sequel, starring Sidney Poitier and Daniel J Travanti.(n)

programme.title: Hunt for the I-5 Killer
programme.desc: Dramatisation of the year-long manhunt for American serial murderer Randall Brent Woodfield, who targeted women along the I-5 motorway in 1981. Thriller, starring John Corbett, Sara Canning and Tygh Runyan.(n)

programme.title: Green Means Go
programme.desc: Jeff Pickles decides it’s time to talk about death on Mr. Pickles’ Puppet Time. His executive producer, Seb, feels that Mr. Pickles the persona and Jeff Pickles the person need to remain separate. Deirdre punishes her daughter Maddy for not eating her veggies. Series premiere.

programme.title: Who Is America?: 101
programme.desc: Comedian Sacha Baron Cohen explores the diverse individuals, from the infamous to the unknown across the political and cultural spectrum, who populate our unique nation. Series premiere.

programme.title: Are You There Shim? It’s Me, Ian.
programme.desc: Frank’s latest sexual escapades get him into trouble with the Hopkins Academy PTA. Fiona struggles with her decision to bail Ian out of jail, while he continues his Gay Jesus antics inside. Lip juggles taking care of Xan with a potential romance. Debbie fights for equal pay at work, and Carl has to prove himself at military school. Kev and V have trouble with the twins without Svetlana. Season premiere.

programme.title: Green Means Go
programme.desc: Jeff Pickles decides it’s time to talk about death on Mr. Pickles’ Puppet Time. His executive producer, Seb, feels that Mr. Pickles the persona and Jeff Pickles the person need to remain separate. Deirdre punishes her daughter Maddy for not eating her veggies. Series premiere.

programme.title: A Box of Dunkies & Two Squirts of Maple Syrup
programme.desc: Concerned that giving birth has blown out her vagina, Bridgette pursues a former hookup for a comparison test. Meanwhile, she also learns that Rafi, her baby's father, is dating someone new. Series premiere.(c)

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as Tony Montana in Brian De Palma's remake of the 1932 gangster classic. Failing to make it legitimately, Tony and his friend Manny Ray turn to a life of crime, building a successful drug empire in 1980s Miami. But as Tony's power grows, so does his list of enemies, ego, and paranoia. Featuring an all-star cast including Michelle Pfeiffer, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Robert Loggia and F. Murray Abraham.

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Christian Slater star with Adam Beach ("Smoke Signals") in this explosive, patriotic WWII drama about a severely wounded soldier (Cage) who takes on the assignment of safeguarding a "windtalker" (Beach), a Navajo whose dead native language provides an unbreakable code for the military - but whose life is jeopardized with every increasingly bloody battle against the Japanese in the Pacific. Christian Slater, Mark Ruffalo, Brian Van Holt and Noah Emmerich costar in this tense, stylish war epic from director John Woo ("Face/Off").

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: Denzel Washington plays a quadriplegic cop who may hold the key to the mystery of a serial killer on a rampage in New York City. Angelina Jolie co-stars as the rookie he must guide through the nightmare.

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: In the 1950's, a talented quarterback (Brendan Fraser) from a working class Jewish family earns a scholarship to a prestigious New England prep school, but must keep his religious faith a secret from his blue blood classmates. Matt Damon and Amy Locane costar in this period drama.

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Robert Redford stars as a CIA maverick who is on the brink of retirement from the field when he learns that his protégé (Brad Pitt) has been arrested in China on a charge of espionage and he must find a way to free him.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Harrison Ford and Liam Neeson star in this gripping, fact-based action drama about the crew of a crippled Russian submarine - the communist country's first nuclear vessel, and one that's nearing a meltdown that could spark a worldwide conflagration at the height of the Cold War. Kathryn Bigelow ("Near Dark") directed this taut thriller costarring Peter Sarsgaard and Joss Ackland.

programme.title: Patch Adams
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as Hunter "Patch" Adams who, after staying in a mental hospital, decides to enlist in med school to become a doctor. Determined to help patients with a unique blend of personal attention and humor, he turns the medical world upside-down with his unorthodox-but-effective treatments.

programme.title: The Cider House Rules
programme.desc: Homer Wells has lived nearly his entire life within the walls of St. Cloud's Orphanage in rural Maine. Though groomed by its proprietor, Dr. Larch, to be his successor, Homer feels the need to strike out on his own and experience the world outside. While working at an apple orchard, Homer falls for the beautiful Candy and learns some powerfully indelible lessons about life, love, and home.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.

programme.title: Are You There Shim? It’s Me, Ian.
programme.desc: Frank’s latest sexual escapades get him into trouble with the Hopkins Academy PTA. Fiona struggles with her decision to bail Ian out of jail, while he continues his Gay Jesus antics inside. Lip juggles taking care of Xan with a potential romance. Debbie fights for equal pay at work, and Carl has to prove himself at military school. Kev and V have trouble with the twins without Svetlana. Season premiere.(c)

programme.title: 2018 Week 1
programme.desc: Every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown for exclusive game highlights from NFL Films plus, expert analysis, in-depth features and hard-hitting commentary from NFL MVPs Phil Simms and Boomer Esiason, veteran linebacker Ray Lewis and special correspondent Steve Smith, Sr.(c)

programme.title: Green Means Go
programme.desc: Jeff Pickles decides it’s time to talk about death on Mr. Pickles’ Puppet Time. His executive producer, Seb, feels that Mr. Pickles the persona and Jeff Pickles the person need to remain separate. Deirdre punishes her daughter Maddy for not eating her veggies. Series premiere.(c)

programme.title: Green Means Go
programme.desc: Jeff Pickles decides it’s time to talk about death on Mr. Pickles’ Puppet Time. His executive producer, Seb, feels that Mr. Pickles the persona and Jeff Pickles the person need to remain separate. Deirdre punishes her daughter Maddy for not eating her veggies. Series premiere.(c)

programme.title: 2018 Week 1
programme.desc: Every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown for exclusive game highlights from NFL Films plus, expert analysis, in-depth features and hard-hitting commentary from NFL MVPs Phil Simms and Boomer Esiason, veteran linebacker Ray Lewis and special correspondent Steve Smith, Sr.(c)

programme.title: Green Means Go
programme.desc: Jeff Pickles decides it’s time to talk about death on Mr. Pickles’ Puppet Time. His executive producer, Seb, feels that Mr. Pickles the persona and Jeff Pickles the person need to remain separate. Deirdre punishes her daughter Maddy for not eating her veggies. Series premiere.(c)

programme.title: Traffic
programme.desc: Director Steven Soderbergh's contemporary thriller evokes the high stakes and high risks of the drug trade, as seen through a series of interrelated stories. Featuring an ensemble cast headed by Michael Douglas, Don Cheadle, Benicio Del Toro, Luis Guzman, Dennis Quaid and Catherine Zeta-Jones.

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star.

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Jess and Leslie couldn't be more different—she's rich, he's poor, she's from the city, he's from the country—but when Leslie begins to open up the world of imagination to Jess, they find they have something amazing to share: the kingdom of Terabithia, a realm of giants, ogres and other enchanted beings that can only be accessed by boldly swinging across a stream in the woods on a strand of rope. Here, Leslie and Jess rule as King and Queen among the incredible creatures they create, and not even the forces of evil can break their bond.

programme.title: Whale Rider
programme.desc: In a small coastal village, the Maori descend from Paikea, the Whale Rider. In every generation, a male heir has succeeded to the chiefly title. When twins are born, and the boy twin dies, the chief is unable to accept his grand-daughter, Pai, as a future leader. Koro, the chief, is convinced that the tribe's misfortunes began at Pai's birth and calls for people to bring their sons to him, sure a new leader will emerge. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: In the wake of Princess Diana's death, the very private and tradition-bound Queen Elizabeth II finds herself in conflict with the new Prime Minister, the slickly modern and image-conscious Tony Blair.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in this lavish historical drama as German aristocrat Claus von Stauffenberg, a formerly loyal Nazi officer who begins to question his country's motivations and tactics in World War II then hatches a dangerous plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler. Bill Nighy and Kenneth Branagh costar in this fact-based thriller.

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is Brian Flanagan, a young, confident and ambitious bartender who, with the help of a seasoned pro (Bryan Brown), becomes the toast of Manhattan's Upper East Side. But when he moves to Jamaica and meets an independent artist (Elisabeth Shue), their vivid romance brings a new perspective to the self-centered bartender's life.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.

programme.title: Captain Fantastic
programme.desc: Deep in the forests of the Pacific Northwest, isolated from society, a devoted father (Viggo Mortensen) dedicates his life to transforming his six young children into extraordinary adults. But when tragedy strikes the family, they are forced to leave this self-created paradise and begin a journey into the outside world that challenges his idea of what it means to be a parent and brings into question everything he's taught them.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is a successful sports agent who must start over and rebuild his life from the ground up. Also starring Cuba Gooding, Jr., Renee Zellweger and Kelly Preston.

programme.title: Green Means Go
programme.desc: Jeff Pickles decides it’s time to talk about death on Mr. Pickles’ Puppet Time. His executive producer, Seb, feels that Mr. Pickles the persona and Jeff Pickles the person need to remain separate. Deirdre punishes her daughter Maddy for not eating her veggies. Series premiere.(n)

programme.title: Legally Blonde
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars as Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen who rallies all her resources and follows her ex-boyfriend to Harvard law school, determined to win him back. But law school is a far cry from the comforts of her poolside and the mall. Elle must wage the battle of her life, for her guy, for herself and for all blondes.(n)

programme.title: Green Means Go
programme.desc: Jeff Pickles decides it’s time to talk about death on Mr. Pickles’ Puppet Time. His executive producer, Seb, feels that Mr. Pickles the persona and Jeff Pickles the person need to remain separate. Deirdre punishes her daughter Maddy for not eating her veggies. Series premiere.(n)

programme.title: 2018 Week 1
programme.desc: Every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown for exclusive game highlights from NFL Films plus, expert analysis, in-depth features and hard-hitting commentary from NFL MVPs Phil Simms and Boomer Esiason, veteran linebacker Ray Lewis and special correspondent Steve Smith, Sr.(n)

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: Before Chuck Wepner (Liev Schreiber) goes fifteen rounds with Muhammed Ali, he's a liquor salesman and father with a modest prizefighting career. His life changes overnight when, in 1975, he is chosen to take on The Greatest in a highly publicized title match. It's the beginning of a wild ride through the exhilarating highs and humbling lows of sudden fame. Elisabeth Moss and Naomi Watts costar.(n)

programme.title: Hell or High Water
programme.desc: Two brothers (Chris Pine and Ben Foster) come together to rob a bank that is foreclosing on their family land. Vengeance seems to be theirs until they find themselves in the crosshairs of a foul-mouthed Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) looking for one last triumph on the eve of his retirement. As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide.(n)

programme.title: Texas Rangers
programme.desc: A ragtag group of youngsters band together after the American Civil War to form the Texas Rangers, a group charged with the duty of cleaning up the West.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: Eight years after the InGen incident, Dr. Alan Grant is happy with his life far from any dinosaurs. He is extremely short on research money, and therefore accepts the offer of wealthy businessman Paul Kirby: A low flight over isolated Isla Sorna, where InGen's second research site was located. What Dr. Grant doesn't know is that Kirby needs a dinosaur expert to help him and his wife find their 14-year-old son Eric, who crashed on the island while paragliding.(n)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: A talented young getaway driver (Ansel Elgort) relies on the beat of his personal soundtrack to be the best in the game. When he meets the girl of his dreams (Lily James), Baby sees a chance to ditch his criminal life and make a clean getaway. But after being coerced into working for a crime boss (Kevin Spacey), he must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: A U.S. fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: A lawyer becomes the target of a corrupt politician and his NSA operatives when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated murder. Starring Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight and Regina King.(n)

programme.title: A River Runs Through It
programme.desc: Two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- grow up in rural Montana. As their lives take separate paths, it's almost impossible for them to express their feelings for each other. But out on the river, all three men come together in their abiding love for fly-fishing and the search for harmony that it represents.(n)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: A tale of victory, defeat and courage focusing on the war's impact on two daring young pilots, Ben Affleck and Josh Hartnett, and a dedicated nurse, Kate Beckinsale, who are caught up in the horror of an infamous morning in 1941.(n)

programme.title: Are You There Shim? It’s Me, Ian.
programme.desc: Frank’s latest sexual escapades get him into trouble with the Hopkins Academy PTA. Fiona struggles with her decision to bail Ian out of jail, while he continues his Gay Jesus antics inside. Lip juggles taking care of Xan with a potential romance. Debbie fights for equal pay at work, and Carl has to prove himself at military school. Kev and V have trouble with the twins without Svetlana. Season premiere.(n)

programme.title: The Pact
programme.desc: Nicole and Annie reluctantly return to their childhood home to pay their respects after their mother passes away. While staying overnight in the house, the sisters sense a mysterious presence in their midst - noises startling them in the night, objects moving about, a fallen picture of an unknown woman posed next to their mother. Annie begins experiencing a series of intense & disturbing dreams, and ­visions that lead to her mother's past finally revealing itself.

programme.title: Maniac
programme.desc: Frank (Elijah Wood) is the withdrawn owner of a mannequin store, whose life changes when young artist Anna appears asking for his help with her new exhibition. As their friendship develops, Frank's obsession escalates and the number of victims increases. It becomes clear to Anna that Frank is far more dangerous than he seems.

programme.title: Skybound
programme.desc: Five plane passengers are unable to land after a gigantic disaster happens on the ground.

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead.

programme.title: Dream House
programme.desc: Daniel Craig and Academy Award winner Rachel Weisz star as a couple that unknowingly moves into a New England home where several grisly murders were committed, only to become the killer's next target. Academy Award nominee Naomi Watts stars as a neighbor who knew the previous family - a family whose gruesome story could be horrific foreshadowing of the present family's demise. Directed by the Academy Award nominee Jim Sheridan.

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas.

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth.

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them.

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death.

programme.title: Willard
